result.execSummary:
The defendant Jacob S Zimmerman was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Controlled Substance, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: 60 days to pay fine or set up a payment plan with Clerk of Courts.

ADDRESS INFO for Jacob S Zimmerman
Current: 215 East Clifton St Room 28, Tomah, WI 54660 United States  (Effective: 02-25-2016)
Prior: 500 E Veterans St, Tomah VA Hospital, Tomah, WI 54660 United States
Columbia County Court Conviction DNA - conviction DNA on file

Defendant, Jacob S Zimmerman, appeared pro se. Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Court went over the right to an attorney. Defendant waived attorney. Rights & elements recited. Defendant plead guilty to count one. Court found defendant guilty, entered judgment, sentence: 15 days jail. Court deemed time served. (12 days jail credit) $443 costs, 60 days to pay fine or set up a payment plan with Clerk of Courts.

Defendant, Jacob S Zimmerman, appeared with Atty. Ryan Frank, special appearance for today. Brenda L. Yaskal appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Reset requested.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 13, 2016 at 03:00 pm.  Return date scheduled for February 18, 2016 at 02:45 pm.
Scheduling Order for the November 5, 2015 jury trial.
Defendant, Jacob S Zimmerman, appeared. Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin. right to atty recited to defendant, not guilty plea entered, matter to be set for jury trial, bond cont'd
